select menu_id, `name`, permission, parent_id, `level`, detail, path, icon, show_flag, sort, create_time, update_time, del_flag from v_menu WHERE del_flag = '0' AND parent_id = #{parentId}
AND show_flag = #{showFlag}

SELECT v_menu.* FROM v_menu LEFT JOIN v_role_menu ON v_menu.menu_id = v_role_menu.menu_id WHERE v_menu.del_flag = 0 AND v_menu.`level` = 1 AND FIND_IN_SET( v_role_menu.role_id, #{roleIds} ) ORDER BY v_menu.sort ASC

SELECT v_menu.* FROM v_menu LEFT JOIN v_role_menu ON v_menu.menu_id = v_role_menu.menu_id WHERE v_menu.del_flag = 0 AND v_menu.show_flag = 1 AND v_menu.parent_id = #{menuId} AND FIND_IN_SET(v_role_menu.role_id, #{roleIds}) GROUP BY v_menu.menu_id ORDER BY v_menu.sort ASC

SELECT v_menu.menu_id FROM v_menu LEFT JOIN v_role_menu ON v_menu.menu_id = v_role_menu.menu_id WHERE v_menu.del_flag = 0 AND v_menu.`level` = 3 AND v_role_menu.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY v_menu.sort ASC
